member.name: T:Windows.Media.Protection.ComponentRenewal
member.summary: Enables applications to initiate renewal of components which need updating in order to play protected media content.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Protection.ComponentRenewal.RenewSystemComponentsAsync(Windows.Media.Protection.RevocationAndRenewalInformation)
member.summary: Initiates updating of critical content protection components after prompting the user.
member.returns: An object that is used to control the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Protection.RenewalStatus
member.summary: Defines the possible values returned from RenewSystemComponentsAsync.

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Protection.RenewalStatus.AppComponentsMayNeedUpdating
member.summary: Specifies that no system components were detected that need updating. But app components may need to be updated, in which case the user may need to get an updated application from the store.

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Protection.RenewalStatus.NoComponentsFound
member.summary: Specifies that no components were found that need to be updated.

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Protection.RenewalStatus.NotStarted
member.summary: Specifies that renewal has not started.

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Protection.RenewalStatus.UpdatesInProgress
member.summary: Specifies that there are updates and the user has allowed updated to proceed

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Protection.RenewalStatus.UserCancelled
member.summary: Specifies that the user declined to allow updates to proceed.
